naslov: ČIOVO // Slatine, apartmanska kuća 50m od mora / pogled / čitaj opis (prodaja)
opis: - ekskluzivna prodaja agencije #adriaINgroup - kupac plaća agencijsku proviziju 3% od prodajne cijene Ova apartmanska kuća u Slatinama predstavlja izvanrednu priliku za one koji traže investiciju u turističkom sektoru ili žele uživati u obiteljskom odmoru uz more. Smještena svega pedeset metara od plaže, pruža prekrasan pogled na Jadransko more i okolnu prirodu. S ukupno oko 400 kvadratnih metara stambenog prostora, plus balkoni, i zemljištem od 740 kvadratnih metara, ova kuća nudi obilje prostora i komfora. Sastoji se od prizemlja i tri kata, s raznolikim smještajnim kapacitetima, uključujući studio apartmane i jednosobne apartmane, svaki s vlastitim balkonom s pogledom na more. + prizemlje (dva studio partmana sa terasom + garaža), 1. i 2. kat se sastoje od 4 jednosobna apartmana sa balkonima,, te treći kat se sastoji od jednosobnog apartmana i studio apartmana. Dodatna pogodnost je 7-8 parking mjesta, što je izuzetno važno za turističke objekte, te mogućnost izgradnje bazena. Izgrađena 1985. i završena 1995. godine, s dijelom renoviranom prije desetak godina, kuća je već etablirana u turističkoj ponudi, što potencijalnom kupcu omogućava lakši početak poslovanja. Osim toga, blizina plaže i mirno okruženje čine je idealnom za opuštajuće ljetovanje. Cijenjeni klijenti, razgled nekretnine moguć je isključivo uz potpisani posrednički ugovor koji je temelj za daljnje radnje vezane za kupoprodaju, a sve sukladno Zakonu o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina.Agencija je u sustavu pdv-a te se na sve usluge obračunava pdv. - NAPOMENA: detaljne slike, video, te lokaciju, šaljemo isključivo uz potpisani posrednički ugovor ENG ----------------------------------------------------------- - exclusive sale of the agency #adriaINgroup - the buyer pays an agency commission of 3% + vat of the sales price This apartment house in Slatine represents an extraordinary opportunity for those who are looking for an investment in the tourist sector or who want to enjoy a family vacation by the sea. Located only fifty meters from the beach, it offers a beautiful view of the Adriatic Sea and the surrounding nature. With a total of about 400 square meters of living space, plus balconies, and a plot of 740 square meters, this house offers plenty of space and comfort. It consists of a ground floor and three floors, with a variety of accommodation capacities, including studio apartments and one-room apartments, each with its own balcony overlooking the sea. + ground floor (two studio apartments with a terrace + garage), the 1st and 2nd floors consist of 4 one-room apartments with balconies, and the third floor consists of a one-room apartment and a studio apartment. An additional convenience is 7-8 parking spaces, which is extremely important for tourist facilities, and the possibility of building a swimming pool. Built in 1985 and completed in 1995, with a part renovated ten years ago, the house is already established in the tourist offer, which enables a potential buyer to start business more easily. In addition, the proximity to the beach and peaceful surroundings make it ideal for a relaxing summer vacation. Dear clients, viewing the property is only possible with a signed brokerage contract, which is the basis for further actions related to the sale, and all in accordance with the Act on Brokerage in Real Estate Transactions. - NOTE: we send detailed pictures, video, and location only with a signed mediation contract #adriaINgroup real estate-consulting-design-development-VIP service ...............................................................
